-- IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
--                 FROM    sys.schemas
--                 WHERE   name = 'mipins' )
--     EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [mipins]');
-- GO

--CREATE VIEW FOR PERSONNEL SUB AREA--

-- CREATE OR ALTER VIEW mipins.vw_mipins_hr_personnel_sub_area
-- AS

-- SELECT 

--     [absence_date]
--     [absence_hours]
--     [staff_number]
--     [Work Schedule Rule]
--     [Abs Type]
--     [Sickness Group]
--     [Attendance or Absence Type]
--     [Leave]
--     [Leave_ONS]
--     [PS Group]
--     [Personnel Area]
--     [Personnel Subarea]
--     [sickness_id]
--     [sickness_length]
--     [sickness_length_type]
--   FROM [sap_hr].[vw_fact_absence_all]

-- GO

SELECT 
    [AbsenceID] AS SicknessID,
	[Days] as SicknessLength,
    CASE 
        WHEN CAST([Days] AS FLOAT) > 20.0 then 'long-term'
		ELSE 'short-term'
    END AS SicknessLengthType
FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[hr_absence_dim]

GO
